greet: Hello there! ask me question about teradata, location of teradata, ttu os support
about: Teradata is a Fortune 1000 provider of data warehouse platforms, software and services. The company was formed in 1979 in a garage in Brentwood, CA, as a collaboration between researchers at Caltech and Citibank's advanced technology group.[2] The company was acquired by NCR in 1991, and subsequently spun-off again as an independent public company on October 1, 2007.
name: The name Teradata symbolized the ability to manage terabytes (trillions of bytes) of data.

location.mumbai: Teradata India Pvt. Ltd, G1, Nomura Bldg., High Street, Hiranandani Business Park, Powai, Mumbai 400076
